misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation.
description: The code is attempting to use the SHA-256 algorithm, but then replaces it with the less-secure MD5 algorithm. This could result in the selection of a less secure cryptographic algorithm.
recommendation: Ensure that the correct algorithm is used without any unnecessary replacements or modifications. In this case, the code should be modified to simply use MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-256"); without any string replacements.
